name: Girish1483
complain: Paytm Mobile Solutions ? missguided from paytm care
full:
Hi, 

The future generali insurance company is giving a lot of frustration to me.  We have renewed the car insurance on 26th of july, 2017 with the full amount payment through vendor austin hyundai patuli branch.  We have given all the declarations to austin hyundai that we had claims on our previous insurance partner bajaj alliance, but intentionally austin hyundai did not provide the correct information to future generali that we had claim from last insurance hence future generali had sent a letter after activation of insurance of 2 months that wrong declaration was provided by us, inspite of knowing the fact it was not our fault we have gone ahead and paid off the no claim bonus charges with the penalty fee of rs 1222...
